Print information about fafbseg setup including tokens and python modules

Source: R/utils.R
dr_fafbseg.Rd

Print information about your fafbseg setup including your FlyWire/ChunkedGraph authentication tokens, Python modules and the nat.h5reg / java setup required for transforming points between EM and light level template brains.

dr_fafbseg(pypkgs = NULL)

Arguments

pypkgs

Additional python packages to check beyond the standard ones that fafbseg knows about such as cloudvolume. When set to FALSE, this turns off the Python package report altogether.

Examples

if (FALSE) {
dr_fafbseg(pymodules=FALSE)
}

Contents
